title: laptop (windows 11) cannot reach www.belastingdienst.nl I Destop (windows 10) can
content:
When I go to www.belastingdienst.nl I receive the message: connection reset. The cause is not business of the site. Furthermore I can load all other sites on my laptop (windows 11) My old desktop (windows 10) does not have such problems. What can I do to reach www.belastinggdienst.nl on my laptop? It might have something to do with my firefox settings.

I am most grateful for any help

ruud de jongh ruudjdejongh@gmail.com
creator: ruudjdejongh

title: Firefox crashes whenever I minimise it
content:
I often need to have Firefox open on half my screen and another doc open on the other half.

Every time I click the 'minimise' button on the top right of my Firefox screen, it freezes then crashes. I have to close it, reopen it, and then it will minimise. This has been happening for months.

Any ideas?
creator: rebecca_r_horn

title: the pages are breaking down and crashing
content: this has been happen at most times am working online i wont be able to open any page again like the page will be mark severally to navigate to the other page i wont be able to open it, and when i click on a particular page it will open it in a new window by it self the only thing i use to do to solve this issues is to restart my PC in which i find so strange just because i wanted to use the browser please check the screen short and find a solution to that for me, i don't really want to change a browser
creator: ekundayo929

title: Graphical problems on Surface Pro X (arm64)
content:
Using the arm64 version of Firefox on a Surface Pro X causes several graphical issues. These issues started either with a update of Firefox or drivers.

This topic has already been reported, please see here for more information and documentation: Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/182iojx/firefox_arm64_graphical_problems_on_surface_pro_x/ Mozilla Connect: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/discussions/firefox-arm64-graphical-problems-on-surface-pro-x/m-p/52086

What can be done to report this issue and help it getting fixed?
creator: felixberger.at

title: Cannot get to websites
content:
After the last update of Firefox, I cannot browse to websites. Firefox simply presents a "New Tab" prompt as if it is trying to get to the website but nothing happens. Other browsers work flawlessly.

Any ideas?

Thank you
creator: ydorg.k

title: Removing Pinterest
content: This is getting ridiculous! Recently the dam pinterest crap keeps popping up when hovering over images. I have yet to find a solution. It doesn't show in add-ons and appears this pinterest crap has just recently showed up. Yes, this is crap!
creator: zchopper62

title: ztracené záložky
content: Dobrý den ztratili se mě všechny záložky chtěl jsem je obnovit v profilu v bookkmarkbackups a je tam jen jediný soubor který vznikl po ztrátě záložek takže je bez záložek . Co s tím mám dělat nejsou ještě někde nějaké zálohy?? Mám zapnutý sync a jelikož v bookkmarkbackups je jen 1 soubor neustále se aktualizuje i bez záložek tudíž když ho chci obnovit načte se bez záložek . Potřebuji obnovit všechny záložky
creator: RadekAbadziev

title: transferred my email account to new computer
content: I recently got a new computer and when I setup/transfer my email account over the history did not transfer with it. How can i get my history to do this? On my second email address I am now not receiving emails?
creator: j.pbarlow

title: Google signin for 3rd party app re-directing me to https://www.arkoselabs.com/
content:
I created an account with chat gpt with my google login. Lately, when I try to log into it using Firefox, after I click the "Continue with Google" button, I am redirected to https://www.arkoselabs.com/ !

After a few tries with the same result, I tried in chrome and had no issues accessing my account.

This one's stumpped me. I'm at a loss. Anyone else having this problem? Is it a redirect virus? Chrome is prone to the yahoo redirect virus. I'm wondering if this is similar or if there's somethin' wrong.
creator: billy.rutledge867037

title: How do I turn off your firewall?
content: I am sick and tired of Firefox denying me access to common store websites. How do I turn off your firewall? I want to shop on Lowes.com and I cannot get access. Firefox is proving recently to be more of a problem than an asset.
creator: janetinlargo

title: Bookmarks Sync
content:
I have some Bookmarks on my laptop. I have some of these Bookmarks (Not all) on my tablet, plus some other Bookmarks.

If I sync them, which direction does the sync work in? Will all my Bookmarks on my laptop now appear on my tablet (Which I do not want to happen)? Will all my Bookmarks on my tablet now appear on my laptop (Which I do want)? Will I end up with two copies of most Bookmarks, because all my laptop Bookmarks are transfered to my tablet, plus all my tablet Bookmarks are transfered to my laptop?

I cannot find any explanatioin of what Sync actually does.
creator: caerbryn
